text:
We have had some problems with the French
Story. The highs are often distorted. I have 5|ssumed
that the problem is in the masters because we have had
the same problem with programs on transcription from
Prance. Have you noticed this?
Once again I have heard that a Mr. Hill was
in town recently. He was here for a TV seminar of some
sort. I didnâ€™t see* him, but I have heard reports.
Is there really such a person?
All the best to you and yours. And thanks for
the splendid service. NAEB tapes have become as reliable
as the noon whistle.
Sincerely
Cliff Eblen
Radio Hall
Madison 6, Wisconsin
